Fuck it hurts, I fucking hate how the mc was so realistic at how he want to be with her but afraid that she didn't feel the same and didn't want to ruin the current relationship with her. And how the friend clearly saw how devastated mc was and didn't try to comfort his friend, I know you shouldn't always put someone infornt of your happiness, but dude at least reassure your friend that you will make her happy and help him move on, bruh that kind of friendship socks. And finally how the girl likes the mc and when the friend lied to her, she gave up so easily and its realistic enough. Fuckkkkk why. I hope there is a sequel where the mc finally tell her that he love her and leaves the friend maybe because got stale or something and break up. Or gets rejected because he took so long that she moved on and actually have a good and healthy relationship with the friend, and the friend helps him to move on throughout. Fuck ntr man.

I was thinking. This is not the most adequate NTR, this is the worst one that can be. Why? He completely worked out your immersion in the character, so that you completely feel like shit, and then delivered the final blow. You wouldn't give it up like that? So what? Immersion in the character, you still put yourself in his place.
The friend is not to blame? This is a well-thought-out plan with a lightning attack to the end when the chance arose. He accelerated events for a reason, he understood everything. He lied nicely to the woman. And skillfully suppressed the hero at the end.
This is a find for people who love betrayal.
Why is it "good" for us? It was just luck. And everyone succeeds at the expense of drawing in this genre. Pages 41-42 is all that pulls me back. Just a meeting of a beautiful angle and worthy drawing. The rest is pretty average.

It's sad that the Japanese have started to love such a fetish, and even worse, that good artists have picked up on it. Authors who know how to draw cool.
What if you show this story from that guy's perspective? He simply achieved the woman, while indicating that he had no malice. And that's all. Nice art, normal story. And a guy who, it seems, does not agree, but we do not really know, and he is not particularly interesting to us.
But here the task was to spoil the mood. Therefore, we get a doormat, a mentally weak woman, and a cunning guy who betrayed a friend without even showing it (but I won't believe that he did not understand anything).
why do these artists not paint something normal, but only produce shit?
also from her point of view it looks like he was actually okay with it. there, all said.

Honestly I am a little uncomfortable with the plot. I understand why people are not happy with this, not because they were jealous with the guy, but because that guy was clearly not good enough for her, he wasnt really the worst kind of guy but he lied about what the MC said to get her, and she was kind of girl who would listen to what the MC said. She wasnt of a slut, just that sex to her wasnt that special to her because she was normally molested a lot in her own family. Her life was filled with tragedy already, and a girl like her deserved a better man, at least like the MC who cares for her not because he wanted to bang out a lot of kids from her. But this is like reality, somehow the best girl was snatched away by cheap tricks like this and endedup with the worse man. And you cant blame the MC though, he didnt know, he just came home and saw his sister having sex. What would you do if you were him? Confront them? If only he knew how the girl felt. And they were relatives after all

People calling her slut to the left and to the right, this is an hentai site, this has a NTR tag at that (and it's really not NTR if you ask me), what did you expect to happen? To watch the tv? Honestly if we disregard the fact that they had sex (because it's an hentai, once again) there was nothing that weird. It's not even the usual over the top thing, she just did it because she was rejected by the dude. Judging the artist (if it ever happens to have a sequel), the mc will let this whole thing off the hook, she'll have sex with the dude another couple of times and then he'll stand up for himself and get her "back", the settings do feel like that to me, if he leaves it open like this or not it changes little, seems fitting his style of ending things.

Cathari is the mvp in this comments section. Thanks. I agree with everything that you said, but I'd also like to add the fact that the girl is a complete slut. There's no reason to deny that. The story literally wants you to feel that way at the end by exposing her past and subverting your expectations, tarnishing the image of this sweet and innocent girl that you sympathized with. One can argue that she had no choice, but in that case she wouldn't be so open about having sex with someone she just met, ESPECIALLY right after having her heart broken by the one she supposedly had feelings for. And when the MC comes back, she has the nerve to just go "welcome back" with a clear conscience. They're both shitty people. I can't even blame the friend, since he would definitely stay away had the MC simply said "yeah, I'm into her." It's amazing how many doujins would be completely fixed if the characters simply knew how to sit down and talk to each other.

So, I like NTR, but after a while, it gets really dull, and borderline frustrating. There are other ways for a MC to get NTR'd. The girl's literally showing her true colors of being unsatisfied with their partner and was made so by another man with quite the talent. this is one of the most horrible and disgusting things in nhentai
@legsandthighs  I do respect your opinion and even understand it, so I am not going to complain any more about this because I do not want to start any unnecessary and avoidable argument.

@legsandthighs this is a great story if you look at it in the sense that is was a story made with the sole goal of pissing off the readers, but it is terrible in every other way (besides art). In my personal opinion I hate this shit with all my heart. And I don’t even wish bad upon the person whoever made this, I just want them to find mental help so that they stop making depressing shit like this. You must be one sad ass loner mf to have to make this shit and rope other people into reading it.

@legsandthighs I agree with @idoncare in saying that people did not expect it to be ntr because usually if someone who is not into ntr accidentally starts reading a story with ntr they quickly know it is ntr within the first 20 pages during the story (most of the times). To make matters worse I really doubt most people searched the tags for a ntr story as this story was on the front page of the website under the “popular” section. The misleading title and  cover genuinely does look like it is purposely luring in vanilla readers for the type of story, and not only that, but the creator has to add insult to injury by adding 40 pages of story building with an wholesome relationship between the brother and sister that is slowly turning into a romantic relationship the creator tricks the viewer into something vanilla or wholesome to happen. Even with the flags with who’s best friend liking his sister and wanting to be with her, there were no obvious flags until the mc left them alone
@legsandthighs I respect your opnion and kind of understand why it may be a good doujin. But I still don't get why in god's name is netorare so damn popular.

@legsandthighs Because people weren't expecting netorare. You can assume that very safely just by looking at the comments. I know the tags are there to show what you are getting into, but the cover sure as hell doesnt do the same, in fact it lures you to a false sense of security and makes you skip checking the tags. Do you really think that if this doujin had a more traditional NTR cover, the people that hated it would still read it?
